p: Photochemiluminescence (PCL) measures the antioxidant capacity of either lipophilic (ACL) or hydrophilic (ACW) pure compounds or complex mixtures. To measure the antioxidant activity of the essences, the (ACL) methodology was used as it was the most advisable to work with essential oils [ 35]. The PCL bioactivity of essential oil samples was compared to that of T. vulgaris essential oil, taken as positive control, and expressed as Î¼mol of Trolox/mL [ 37].
